name: UISceneCollectionJoinBehavior
desc: A set of behaviors that specify how a new scene joins a scene collection.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: A behavior that uses the system preferences for joining collections.

items.name: case preferred
items.desc: A behavior that adds the new scene to the requesting scene’s collection and activate it, or attempts to join a compatible collection.

items.name: case preferredWithoutActivating
items.desc: A behavior that adds the new scene to the requesting scene’s collection without activating it, or attempts to join a compatible collection.

items.name: case disallowed
items.desc: A behavior that creates a new collection for the new scene, ignoring system preferences.
